description.0: A boomerang made from the fangs of a giant sea serpent. It was a rare weapon indeed that the giant Tupac would call "trusty."

0.0: Decreases Swimming Stamina consumption by 15%. In addition, for 10s after using an Elemental Skill, Max HP is increased by <cryo>20%</cryo>. For every Hydro Elemental Type character in the party, Max HP is increased by another <cryo>12%</cryo>, and the maximum increase that can be achieved in this way is <cryo>24%</cryo>. Can be triggered once every 15s.

1.0: Decreases Swimming Stamina consumption by 15%. In addition, for 10s after using an Elemental Skill, Max HP is increased by <cryo>25%</cryo>. For every Hydro Elemental Type character in the party, Max HP is increased by another <cryo>15%</cryo>, and the maximum increase that can be achieved in this way is <cryo>30%</cryo>. Can be triggered once every 15s.

For every Hydro Elemental Type character in the party, Max HP is increased by another <cryo>21%</cryo>, and the maximum increase that can be achieved in this way is <cryo>42%</cryo>. 4.0: Decreases Swimming Stamina consumption by 15%. In addition, for 10s after using an Elemental Skill, Max HP is increased by <cryo>40%</cryo>. For every Hydro Elemental Type character in the party, Max HP is increased by another <cryo>24%</cryo>, and the maximum increase that can be achieved in this way is <cryo>48%</cryo>.
